channel.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://imgwiz.com/images/2014/09/22/2hfUp.png[/img] [b][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Miscellaneous Information[/SIZE][/b]
[SIZE=2]Runique is based off my own custom framework Niobe, which gives me more of an 'advantage' over using a framework such as Project Insanity where a lot of content would be limited due to how the server is built.
We try our best to target every single player, meaning we have a wide variety of gameplay choices you can choose, such as:
• Choosing between old school models or new school models[/color] • Letting you play either with or without ground textures • Using constitution/x10 prayer - real hits and prayer, not a made up x10 number[/COLOR] • Using 'glossy' models since some players do like how it looks
We try to emulate RuneScape as much as we can when it comes to content such as Skilling, Minigames, Etc - but we do make our own custom features to set us apart from any other server! For example our very own custom Anti-Scam Gambling System or our very own Hunger Games(based) Minigame![/SIZE]
[b][SIZE=5]Download Links[/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://runique.org/"]Runique | Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://community.runique.org/"]Runique | Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://runiquedl.org/runique_os.jar"]Old School Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runiquedl.org/runique_ns.jar"]New School Client[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://runiquedl.org/webclient.php?version=old"]Old School Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runiquedl.org/webclient.php?version=new"]New School Webclient[/URL] [/center]

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

#Bump

A little insight into what we will be doing after our Christmas Event from one of our owners:

  • All bosses added to ‘special slayer’ tasks.
  • Corp Beast Pets, amongst the others we have not yet added. ( Requested by a few players)
  • Fixing Penguin Agility Course
  • New Drop Rates
  • New Clue Scroll rewards, Merchant Shop, Crystal Chest Rewards

Read full topic

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

[QUOTE=relex lawl;4727429]We are working on a new “quick”-teleportation system:

[/QUOTE]

We have also released [B]boss pets[/B] which are a very rare drop from any boss you kill, example; Bandos/Corporal Beast etc.

In addition Arma crossbow has been added to the Arma boss and the Saradomin boss now has a chance to drop a [B]Saradomin tear[/B] which if you combine with a saradomin sword it will be enchanted into a blessed saradomin sword which has increased stats compared to the saradomin sword.

Read full topic

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @Zeyntra Zeyntra
item.description:
@Zeyntra wrote:

Hi, everyone! The Grand Exchange is on the verge of being released. We are currently in beta testing, and our amazing developer, Relex has patched up many bugs!

Just when you think that’s enough, Relex has added another update in the meantime. It is a preset slot where you can set your gear and inventory beforehand,

The inventory items and equipment are withdrawn from your bank. The picture above shows what the second and third slot appears to non-donators, as they only get one preset slot.

Here is an example of one of my slots, for PKing,

Read full topic
item.source: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

[url=http://www.runelocus.com/forums/usertag.php?do=list&action=hash&hash=Bump]#Bump[/URL] - A little update from one of owners.

A shoutout to ‘reggie’ whom suggested we added this as an extension of the ::gendrop command which will now be available to all players. Instead of items being deposited directly to your bank an interface will pop up showing the ‘fake drops’ you’ve generated. This allows players to get a further understanding of our current drop rates.

You can find the npc ids, from our ‘drop_table’ located on our client.

Command: ::drops [npcId] [amount]

Other Updates:

  • Other game modes will no longer be able to attack iron man with steel titans.

Read full topic

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

It’s been quite some time since an update has been posted but we have a massive update being released very soon!

It’s almost time! The grand exchange still needs some work but as you can see Relex has begun the interfaces. There’s only 10% of this project left to finish before our beta testing will begin.

We also will have a new quest for you all on the 29th! Plus we have also redecorated our spawn to suit the Halloween theme and also implemented a fun event that involves the collection of wrapped candies which can be obtained from pvming/skilling and a few other various ways which can all be found out by visiting our forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Players suggested to add bank pins for extra protection on their account, so decided to work on it

I got the main thing done, just need to work on the other features such as changing the pin and also deleting it. If you delete it, you will have to wait an X amount of days - this gives the original owner a chance to at least report their situation to an Administrator.

Read full topic
item.source: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes

item.title: Runique - Choose Your Revision | Perfect Bank Tabs | Achievements | 6 Game Modes
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

[CENTER]
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Miscellaneous Information[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]Runique is based off my own custom framework Niobe, which gives me more of an ‘advantage’ over using a framework such as Project Insanity where a lot of content would be limited due to how the server is built.

We try our best to target every single player, meaning we have a wide variety of gameplay choices you can choose, such as:

• Choosing between old school models or new school models[/color]
• Letting you play either with or without ground textures
• Using constitution/x10 prayer - real hits and prayer, not a made up x10 number[/COLOR]
• Using ‘glossy’ models since some players do like how it looks

We try to emulate RuneScape as much as we can when it comes to content such as Skilling, Minigames, Etc - but we do make our own custom features to set us apart from any other server! For example our very own custom Anti-Scam Gambling System or our very own Hunger Games(based) Minigame![/SIZE]

[b][SIZE=5]Download Links[/SIZE]

[URL=http://“http://runique.org/”]Runique | Home[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://community.runique.org/”]Runique | Forums[/URL]

[URL=http://“http://runiquedl.org/runique_os.jar”]Old School Client[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://runiquedl.org/runique_ns.jar”]New School Client[/URL]

[URL=http://“http://runiquedl.org/webclient.php?version=old”]Old School Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://runiquedl.org/webclient.php?version=new”]New School Webclient[/URL]
[/center]
